durable.review: High quality steel and feels very durable with its double wall design.

quality.review: Bad quality paint, 1st day and it has already chipped, very disappointed on this

review_types.best_review: First thoughts when I received the bottle was how well it was packaged.  Bottle looks and feels great.  Has good tactile feel for gripping and weight.  High quality steel and feels very durable with its double wall design.  Definitely keeps the water cold for a long duration.  The UV cap charges easily and works as directed.  I like the fact my water bottle will keep sanitized constantly throughout the days and weeks without any mold or bacteria buid up. Overall I am very pleased.
review_types.worst_review: Bad quality paint, 1st day and it has already chipped, very disappointed on this
review_types.neutral: works great and use everywhere I go
